name: Way Ahead
description:
How to play

You are in control of your car and your journey.

  • "W" to accelerate
  • "S" to break
Credits

This game is a submission to National Road Safety Game Jam and was developed by Sergey Germogentov over a couple of days in May 2022.

  • Destructible assets from 2D Destructible Objects package
  • Sound effects from Freesound.org
